example_sentence_italian: È bello potere contare su di te.
example_sentence_english: It's nice to be able to rely on you.
If I could choose I would go to the sea.
I was able to see him.
I was able to see her.
We were able to help them.
We were able to see them.
Can I come in?
Can you help me?
He can speak now.
We can start.
You can come tomorrow.
They can do it.

example_sentence_italian: Quando ero giovane potevo correre lontano.
example_sentence_english: When I was young I could run far.
You could have told me earlier.

example_sentence_italian: Quando era bambino poteva dormire ovunque.
example_sentence_english: When he was a child he could sleep anywhere.

example_sentence_italian: Potevamo vedere il mare dalla finestra.
example_sentence_english: We could see the sea from the window.
You could have called earlier.
They could help if they wanted.
That year I was able to travel a lot.

example_sentence_italian: Potesti terminare il compito in tempo.
example_sentence_english: You were able to finish the task on time.

example_sentence_italian: Alla fine poté spiegare la verità.
example_sentence_english: In the end he/she was able to explain the truth.
That day we were able to leave early.
You could see the problem clearly.
They were able to solve the matter.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'potuto'
